entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
